# Hype REPL Demo Commands
# Try these commands in the REPL to test functionality

# Basic Lua expressions
2 + 2
print("Hello from REPL!")
"This is a " .. "concatenated string"

# Variables persist across commands
x = 10
y = 20
x + y

# Tables and loops
t = {a=1, b=2, c=3}
for k,v in pairs(t) do print(k, v) end

# Load modules
local http = require('http')
local crypto = require('crypto')

# Use crypto module
crypto.sha256("test")
crypto.digest("sha384", "hello repl")

# Generate JWK
jwk = crypto.generate_jwk("RS256")
jwk.kty

# Functions work too
function factorial(n)
    if n <= 1 then return 1 end
    return n * factorial(n-1)
end
factorial(5)

# Multi-line constructs
for i = 1, 5 do
    print("Number: " .. i)
end

# Error handling
this_will_error()
1 / 0

# Access to all Hype features
local kv = require('kv')
local ws = require('ws')
print("All modules loaded!")
